website_summaries.verdict: A tiny but effective pump that boasts up to 210 psi and pumps on both stroke directions.
pros: Though it takes several strokes to completely fill tires, its ability to pump in both directions is useful, and it has a readable gauge
Customers praise this pump for its solid construction and the company’s excellent customer service
The one-year warranty offers peace of mind
cons: It takes several strokes to inflate tires, and the gauge struggles to read below 30 psi

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: The pump works but is not easy to use. If you have to inflate an inner tube from 0 p.s.i, your hands and forearms will be work out. The air pressure release is on the end cap. After 30 strokes, you might be temped to place your thumb there to get more force pushing the two halves together. You will loose air that way as soon as you touch the release valve. I works well enough that I will keep the item, knowing that I won't be using it everyday. I have used it on both shraeder and presta and it works well enough if you have strong fingers to twist the end piece.
customer_reviews.author: Black Razor

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box (updated)
customer_reviews.text: I guess the pump works fine but my pressure gage definitely remains on zero at all times... Update: The company quickly reached out to me and sent me a new pump. They felt my original pump was most likely defective. Pump number 2 is perfect and my bike is riding wonderfully! Highly recommend this pump! This company has wonderful customer service and truly stands behind their products!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Dani

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: The pump looks nice but does not functionally work at all. I got it for portability, pressure gauge and presta valve type. Portability is good The pressure gauge is a joke, it does not work The pump barely works and after pumping for a couple minutes (after being very careful with making connection) there was little to no air in the tube. I reverted to my air compressor, which is not portable and does not have a gauge. The product seems to be substandard.
customer_reviews.author: David Kordell

customer_reviews.title: Unscrews Removable Valve Cores
customer_reviews.text: This pump not only takes a ton of effort to top off a road tire to proper pressure but from time to time will take out the valve core from the presta valve when you unscrew it, instantly taking the tire down to 0 PSI. If you don't have a valve core tool with you you're completely screwed at this point and even if you can get the core back in there's no telling weather or not it will come back after you inflate the tire back up.
customer_reviews.author: rehpotsirhc

customer_reviews.title: Pressure gauge inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Pressure gauge wildly inaccurate. Reported 30 psi on tire I had just tested using reliable gauge at 80 psi. Returned for refund. UPDATED REVIEW. Vender quickly got in touch with me and sent me another pump. Unfortunately, the pressure gauge on the replacement was also defective. I raised my rating to 3-star because of customer service and because the pump itself seems to work fine. I used the Presta valve; perhaps the pressure gauge works better with a Schrader valve, I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect frame pump... easy to pump!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect pump! Easiest frame pump I've ever used for pumping up tires. Not only is there a little hose, but the base swivels so the hose is never torqued. I've used it on both schrader and presta with no issues at all. It screws right on. The pressure relief valve is great. The mounting bracket is solid. The only thing that would make this better is if it came in a darker color... I'm afraid it draws a lot of attention to itself and it will probably get stolen at some point. Amazing pump. I just bought a second one to keep on another bike.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Good in a pinch but not for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a few days and didn’t really have to fully pump a tire but I tooled around with it. Pros: Well made. Good fit and finish on the metal. Pumps on in and out for fast inflation. Lightweight. Cons: The built on adapter for the presta/schrader tip has no knurling or grip. Think of having slightly sweaty hands (always when biking) and not being able to screw it back off. Major design flaw. Also, all you PSI crazy MTBers, it doesn’t even register readings below 30 psi and at that low PSI it is isn’t enough pressure to use the bleed valve for fine tuning.
customer_reviews.author: The Big Bopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money I've used other hand pumps ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money I've used other hand pumps which take two or three minutes to get to about 110psi. This has a bivalve in it so you're inflating the tire even on the draw stroke while the release valve keeps the desired pressure after you're done. The only downside is the tube mount is too narrow for most road bikes which renders it virtually useless unless you fabricate your own or have a day bag.
customer_reviews.author: EluZive853

customer_reviews.title: Tried 3 times and then had to call an Uber.
customer_reviews.text: So I finally had to use this pump and it failed me. I have continental presta valves that also unscrew for extensions. So every time I inflated the tire and tried to remove the pump it would take the presta top along with it and then all the air went out. Tried 3 times and then had to call an Uber.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Small, easy, and works for my 90 psi tires!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pump I have and I just wanted a small pump to attach to my bike to have in case/when I get a flat and this pump is exactly what I needed. It does take quite a bit of effort, and a bit of sweat, to pump my tires up to 90psi. Given the size of the pump, that is no surprise and so I'm totally fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob N.

customer_reviews.title: did not work, almost broke my valves
customer_reviews.text: This pump bound up on my schraeder valves and I needed to use pliers to remove the valve stem from the pump. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent emergency or backup pump.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items you hope you don't need to use while on the trails. But if you do it is one of those items your glad you have. Adapts from Schrader valve to Presta valve instantly with no adapters required. Aired my front forks (Schrader) then tires (Presta) with ease. Easily fits into backpack with water. Recommend as an emergency or backup pump and not a primary one.
customer_reviews.author: BYUBOY

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...once
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to pump up my presta valve equipped tire...until I removed it. When unscrewing the pump the very first time a rubber gasket of some sort came out of the pump and was stuck to my valve. I tried to reinsert it into the pump but no matter what I did the pump simply leaks air now. Too bad, cuz when it was working it pumped fast and easy, and was easy to affix to frame. Time to send it back...
customer_reviews.author: John Belius Jr

customer_reviews.title: Well-built and has held up ok thus far!
customer_reviews.text: This managed to get my tires up to 100 without too much trouble. It feels well-built, although there is a minor ergonomic deficiency in the ease with which you can smoosh your fingers while pumping, and the hose connection on the pump end feels as though it might one day fall off (but not today). Clip secures the pump to the frame, and a velcro strap holds it in place, which is useful for rough rides or transporting bike on the back of your car.
customer_reviews.author: Nat M. ZorachTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Pump works good, its light weight and I was able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Pump works good , its light weight and I was able to attach it to to bike and still have bottle cage attached with it . Works just as good if not better than my floor pump. I have only used it once so far on my mt. bike which is a 45 - 65 psi. tire I haven't tried it on my road bikes yet which have 100 psi and 116 psi tires . But I'm sure I will at some point in time.
customer_reviews.author: torch

customer_reviews.title: Best pump for the money. WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Best little mini pump I have ever used. Works on both in and out stroke. LOVE the gauge. Well made. One of the best Presta valve connections I have had the pleasure to use. Tested it on the day I received it. First flat repair it aired up the 26x2.35 MTB tire like a champ. Will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Russwhitt

customer_reviews.title: Presta Valves Need Not Apply
customer_reviews.text: This pump is not a good fit for Presta valves. It does not establish a good fit for Presta valves. It's not easy to use. The valve locking mechanism became stuck on my rear tire. I was concern it would rip out my valve core when I finally was able to get the pump unstuck. It went into the trash can afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: HobbesInVA

customer_reviews.title: High quality bike pump
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality bike pump! it really is excellent and very easy to use. I use it on my road bike and got all the pressure normalized. Pump worked well and pressure gauge is pretty accurate. I managed to inflate my tires very quickly thanks to the dual action air delivery system. The bike pump is compact and durable. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a pike pump with a good gauge on it. After using is several times, I would say this is a great pump. Just have to be careful how you hold it while using the pumping action as you can pinch the palm of your hand. The pump is great though and the screw on capability to ensure a tight connection is great. Recommend for all bikers.
customer_reviews.author: Sbrundle

customer_reviews.title: Compact and ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pump with really nice features. A frame clamp is included for your bicycle but I will be keeping this on my motorcycle for emergencies. It is very compact but the flexible hose means that I will be able to pump larger volumes of air using more natural motions than if the pump barrel was fixed directly to the valve.
customer_reviews.author: Ragged Clown

customer_reviews.title: F off
customer_reviews.text: WOW if I wanted more flats I would have never spent 20 minutes pumping up my tire with this crappy little pump. The presta adapter works great for decoring valves, fantastic in the side if a trial. Suberb design. I want my f-ing money back and all the trail days I lost
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The pump works perfectly for the intended use. Yes, the pressure gauge isn't accurate but I reinflate the tire until the tire feels as firm as the tire that didn't flat. Also, I have to keep my palm off of the end of the pump or the pump chamber won't refill with air for the next stroke. I have attached the pump mount under the down tube water bottle cage and it stays well clear of my feet as I peddle.
customer_reviews.author: LaLoni K.

customer_reviews.title: Great size and solidly built
customer_reviews.text: I received this pump and tried it out. Due to user error, it didn't seem to be working. Fortunately, the owner of the company had already sent me an email to confirm I received the pump and that I was satisfied with it. I sent back a question and quickly got a response with written directions that cleared up the error I was making. The pump works great, is compact and seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Presta
customer_reviews.text: I tried ever trick imaginable to get this to work on a Presta valve and can't get it to stay on during pumping - keeps falling off and ended up bending my valve stem.
customer_reviews.author: hgpilot - MM

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Returned pump as it was very bulky for my bike pack. Also, the plastic cover on the dial wouldn't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: eddo

customer_reviews.title: Great bike pump
customer_reviews.text: Great bike pump. The presto to Schrader swap is super slick and works great. I would give this 5 stars, except that the cover for the gauge cracked immediately and now won’t stay on. Will need to repair with some super glue. Otherwise, great bay for buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this small air pump for inflating the airbags on the rear suspension of my pickup truck (40-60 lbs) when hauling our truck camper. Works great in every way and is very compact and stows well in the outside compartment of the camper. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small bike pump with a guage for my folding Citizen bike and so far it's a perfect fit! The mounting bracket took seconds to attach, it's small size works well for a folding bike and yes it works! Maybe one small drawback is that it has a screw on valve fitting instead of a pop on type, but I am very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D Twain

customer_reviews.title: Worths the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this mini-pump. I actually bought it to take care of my electric scooter tires, and the pressure gauge was a must. It worked perfectly so far, it looks very precise, really well made, with good materials. Very easy to use, good looking, efficient. The pressure release button on top is actually excellent. It was definitely very well engineered. I'll keep this one for life, and will recommend it. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Carpinelli

customer_reviews.title: Ok for low pressure. Not great for bike tubes.
customer_reviews.text: Great for adding air to things less than 30psi. Anything over that and I would recommend a different pump. Presta threads strip easily and a pain to use on a bike tube between the rim spokes.
customer_reviews.author: Burton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. The construction seems well made. The gauge seems to work pretty well. Very compact. The extension hose makes it easier to access valves in tight spots. The black tip that screws onto your valve is a little tough to turn. Maybe if it were longer it would be better. Overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: Small+powerful
customer_reviews.text: So far so good very easy to pump air...but the gauge is faulty it doesn't work at all. The only reason its 4☆ cause it's very durable material. BEAWARE OF SMOOTH VALVES
customer_reviews.author: JOE

customer_reviews.title: Good Pump for the Road
customer_reviews.text: This small pump took my bike tire from 70 psi to 90 psi with 35 pumps. A laborious process to be sure, but it fits in my bike bag and will bail me out when the need arises. The gauge worked well. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hauwiller

customer_reviews.title: Junk Pump
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and it feels great.Worked on two tires, they pumped up great. The pump failed on the third tire. I checked the tube, the valve, the hose, everything. The pump itself broke after only 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Hershey

customer_reviews.title: DOKO-IN MINI BIKE PUMP
customer_reviews.text: I tested this on a presta valve and it was easy to hook up and use. I really like the gauge and the pressure release button. It's compact and the bracket worked great on my bike. Great pump!
customer_reviews.author: tracksmith

customer_reviews.title: Doko-In: excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The pump is exactly what I was looking for, and works great. I especially love the gauge and the compatibility with both Presta and Schrader. But even more so, the customer service I got from Doko-In was fantastic. When the pump arrived the gauge's plastic cap was broken, so I returned the pump via Amazon, and ordered a new one. The new one was intact, and within hours of delivery the Doko-In team reached out to make sure the new pump was good, and works as expected. The personal touch and care for me as a consumer is highly appreciated, and differentiates between sellers. Given that, the next time I have a choice, I will buy from Doko-In.
customer_reviews.author: Nimrod Berman

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: Great design, but does not last very long. I purchashed in Feb. 2019 and it worked very well the first time I used it. The next time, not so good. My bike tires are supposed to be inflated to 60 psi. But even though the gauge shows 60 psi, it is in fact about 15 psi.
customer_reviews.author: Austrianminded

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked some instructions on how to attach it to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the product a few days ago and have used it on three tires so far. I even aired up my son's bike tire which was flat and it didn't take very long. I would have liked some instructions on how to attach it to the two types of valves but it was fairly intuitive and I was able to figure it out (you have to screw it onto the valves instead of pulling down a lever like a lot of pumps). I love having the pressure gauge on it so I can see if I am in the right range for the tire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought it because it has a gauge, but it doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had it over a year before I needed it and it did pump ok, but the gauge always registers zero. I selected it over other pumps because it has a built-in gauge, so this was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W Cain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent on the bike need it now pump
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I have a mountain bike and it is a pain to pump up if i have a flat while in the woods. The large dial, the flexible hose and large easy to use pump capacity make the not fun task much easier. It stays on the bike no matter what bumpy terrain i'm riding
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product that is well designed. The screw-in connector is optimum for ensuring a positive seal. The integrated gauge is very handy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pump I bought after recently buying a bicycle. I tried it as soon as I received it. It still do the job but it's not that fast. I did get kind of tired before I was able to bring my tire pressure from 30 to 50 psi. This may be normal as it's a "mini" pump. Easy to carry, practical, well made. Satisfied with my purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pump
customer_reviews.text: Good pump my first pump the gauge didn't work but doko promptly offered a refund or send a new one. I chose new one and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Cryonic

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been desperate for a mini bike pump with a pressure gage. I actually bought one @ my local bike shop that want any good that I had to return before looking online. This product took me a second to figure out, as I've never used a hand held pump before, but it screws on perfect to my bike tire and I could monitor the gage. Over all, this is a great product. Haven't mounted it to my bike yet, but it's super light and will easily attach to my frame.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great service and great product
customer_reviews.text: I got the product and didn't know how to pump up my own tire. I put the pump in a box. DOKO sent me an email asking if I had any questions and 5 minutes later I figured out my mistake. (solution - you have to screw the hose to the valve stem) . The solution worked great and also makes this product superior to the others on the market, and the customer service is unexpectedly good. I recommend this company
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pump works fine but don't trust the guage. It reads way way to low.
customer_reviews.author: B. Russell

customer_reviews.title: be warned: on the heavy side
customer_reviews.text: I am usually not overly concerned with adding weight to my bike but I do give it a thought. Although the shipping weight on Amazon for this shows as 4 oz, it is really 6.95 oz w/ the bracket. 6.46 w/o the bracket. looks well made though.
customer_reviews.author: EdQ

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact, easy to use. Exactly what I needed. This actually for my wheelchair, not a bicycle. It easily straps on under my seat. Thank you so much for such an easy transaction and a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well just as advertised. Pumped my road bike tire to 100psi
customer_reviews.text: works well just as advertised. Pumped my road bike tire to 100psi. It takes many pumps as stated in their description.
customer_reviews.author: William Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Gauge sucks, good luck
customer_reviews.text: Pump works but gauge doesn't so.. yeah, good luck with that.
customer_reviews.author: J&S

customer_reviews.title: Nice pump, came in on time as scheduled
customer_reviews.text: Nice pump, came in on time as scheduled. Used it as soon as it arrived. Works great, the pressure gage, and the selectable nozzle for Shrader vs Presta is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Good, pricey, nice features high preasure too
customer_reviews.text: I feel it pricey, but good. I like the air fill on both stroke directions. I don't like that the end cap on the red portion hits the silver tube on the up stroke, but just my quirk. Nice features and high preasure
customer_reviews.author: Hog

customer_reviews.title: Overall, very happy
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Very easy to go from the different types. The gauge is also a great addition! It's a little difficult to pump once you reach higher pressures but that's honestly expected. Overall, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but that it.
customer_reviews.text: It will inflate the tire but the gauge is not going to be accurate
customer_reviews.author: Alan R

customer_reviews.title: This pump does a good job on quick tube fill-ups
customer_reviews.text: This pump does a good job on quick tube fill-ups. The gauge is not super accurate, and if you need to add a lot of air you would be better served with a larger pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pressure on sports balls, doesn't move the pressure gauge
customer_reviews.text: This review, is only for those, that like me, bought the pump primarily for filling sports balls. I have several soccer balls, that specify the pressure range the ball must have. I bought this pump thinking that the gauge will help with that. The fact is that the pressure is too low for the gauge to read it. The pump in itself works great. It's very compact and easy to use. Perhaps the gauge works great on bicycle tires.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I got it specifically for my roller skis because the valve on the tires is not easy to access
customer_reviews.text: I just used the pump for the first time yesterday. I got it specifically for my roller skis because the valve on the tires is not easy to access. My regular bike pump didn’t work because it was too large, which is why I purchased this one. This pump worked perfectly! It also works well on my jogging stroller. The bonus is that it’s small and compact so it can easily travel with me in the event that I need it on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, was delivered in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Great product, was delivered in perfect condition. Very well build/construction. Appears to be made by high quality materials and definitely performs as described by manufacturer. I would highly recommend this product, great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service - Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Hello Dror - I just wanted to thank you for your expert service on replacing our defective bike pump. The new one has arrived and is perfect – just as described! We are very happy with your product and extremely pleased with your customer service. We will be sure to recommend you to our friends and family. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: S Starr

customer_reviews.title: Pump
customer_reviews.text: just received it. 100% as advertised, looks solid and rugged. Need to try it out. Nice bracket mount.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great little pump
customer_reviews.text: Great little pump. Purchased to use for the air shocks on my Harley Trike. Easy readout and stows away without taking up any space. Also used for a couple of inflatable toys and it worked a lot faster than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Powell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with non-functioning pressure gauge.
customer_reviews.text: The pressure gauge doesn't work - it's stuck at zero! Other than that, seems like a good design - but I needed a pressure gauge.
customer_reviews.author: --Jason--

customer_reviews.title: So far, really happy with the pump and pressure delivered
customer_reviews.text: So far, really happy with the pump and pressure delivered
customer_reviews.author: AFONSO H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for on-bike tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Hope I never have to use it on the road but now I have it. Looks like it will do the trick. Remember to buy a patch kit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne J. Hom

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. High quality.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I give it 4 stars is the hose end is hard to hold when pumping. Love the pressure I can get and the pressure relief button. Valve connector seals well on presta valves but seems a bit fragile time will tell if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T. Lowell

customer_reviews.title: easily attaches.
customer_reviews.text: Fills the bill for a handy pump. Well made, easily attaches.
customer_reviews.author: FmrAFpilot

customer_reviews.title: Good quality in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Got the pump on time. Good packaging. I like the small size and quality components. Used it to inflate a soccer ball. It worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Nachacha

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I needed it to do! Easy to attach to the bike even for a novice. Pumped my tires to 40 psi from 5 psi in minutes. It's small so it's easy to store in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: NewDogOwner

customer_reviews.title: The pump arrived on time and the pump is exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: The pump arrived on time and the pump is exactly what I was expecting! I use it as my emergency pump for my daily biking and the gauge helps me keep the correct psi!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pump, gauge doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: The pressure gauge doesn't work - it never moves from zero. The pump works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Jekielek

customer_reviews.title: Good pump, and it's nice that it fits both ...
customer_reviews.text: Good pump, and it's nice that it fits both schrader and presta valves. The gauge on my pump never worked though. 2019 Edit: changed from 3 stars to 5. First, the pump is still working two years later which I find impressive enough on its own for this price point. More importantly, I got the pressure gauge to work. The entire gauge can unscrew by hand - I did this and blew it out with compressed air, and when reinstalled the gauge began to work.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Compact. Threads for seal, nice to know PSI, doesn't attach to my cruiser, but would to a bike with a receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayle Stole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: mounts perfectly on bike, durable material. gauge is accurate.dual action on pumping very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product but takes a lot of strokes to pump a bike tire from 10psi up to 40psi.
customer_reviews.author: terryt120r

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Likes: works as promised, looks good, love the gauge and that it’s travel size Dislikes: the instructions are not helpful. However, all I needed to do was look it up online, but it would have been nice to have relevant instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea A.

customer_reviews.title: Two for One!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product as I no longer need to carry two pumps. This pump can take care of both tires and shocks. The dial is also pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: This pump is fantastic it works great
customer_reviews.text: This pump is fantastic it works great, comes with everything i needed, plus its small compact and lightweight to keep in my bag
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG DURHAM

customer_reviews.title: Nice little pump and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Nice little pump and great customer service. My only issue is the black connector that attaches to the stem. It's very smooth and hard to get a good twisting grip (especially removing it from the stem) with cold or slippery hands or while in an awkward position. I like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Can't You Hear Me Knockin'?NAME_NOT_RETURNED

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well for a hand pump. The screws provided are not long enough to attach both the bottle holder and pump holder, so you may need to buy two longer screws. No instructions provided either.
customer_reviews.author: RPT

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! I used it the night I got it ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I used it the night I got it and it's perfect. Very light and portable, easy to use, and the pressure gauge with an air release was so nice to have. Thank you for making this product! Sincerely a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pump and very easy to use. Small enough to fit in my backpack
customer_reviews.author: DNA

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome pump. Super easy to use and carry in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pump. Super easy to use and carry in your backpack. There is a clip to hook it to the bike if you would like to mount it right on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works, and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Finally had a chance to try out this pump on a friend’s new inner tube. Seems like it took fewer pumps stand my other pump to fill up the tire. The radial gauge on the side really did help let us know when the tire was full. I like this pump!
customer_reviews.author: Skip Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Hello, it did arrive on time and I took it out, used it, and put it on my bike and rode around with it, so far it seems to work great. The plastic bike mount is the only thing that seems a little weak to me, but other than that it seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan smitty

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works good with a small size. Attaches under water bottle holder. I would have liked some instructions on how to do this.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Mini-Bike pump!
customer_reviews.text: One of the BEST pumps I have ever purchased! Don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.author: Thom MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size , works great and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Hope to never have to use it , Knowing its there and its reliability is comforting,
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cardillo

customer_reviews.title: Great compact pump
customer_reviews.text: Great compact pump. Well made, sturdy and best of all it's really bivalve, both in and out strokes pump air. Clever valve connector handles both Schrader and Presta with ease. The pressure gauge is accurate. I like that the flexible inflation hose swivels. Really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous user

customer_reviews.title: Great mini pump
customer_reviews.text: Great pump. Was surprised at how easy it was to pump my tires to 100psi with such a small pump.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Sultanik

customer_reviews.title: The pump is fantastic! I love it and use it very often
customer_reviews.text: The pump is fantastic! I love it and use it very often. I love how it has the gauge integrated with it which helps me measure the air while I am pumping the tire. The max limit for my bike tire is 90 and I found that it took me around 3-5 minutes to pump the air. Its quite fast too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it yet but seems like a good quality product. Good transaction, no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Giannandrea

customer_reviews.title: Good little pump
customer_reviews.text: Good little pump. Installs easy. Comes with plastic screws in case you are missing yours.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Switches easily between presta and schrader valves. Pump much more efficiently than the cheep bell Walmart pump I started with.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use on balls, bikes & hand truck tires.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Brown

customer_reviews.title: screw on valve makes pumping tires easier
customer_reviews.text: I love that this screws on to the valve. I am never able to get the press on pumps on, this made thongs SOOOO much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini pump
customer_reviews.text: Nice mini pump .....nice n small n versatile great advantage to having the attached gauge
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really great product, doesn't feel cheap. Only issue I have is the strap for the frame mount is small and it doesn't fit my bike.
customer_reviews.author: hukkles

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. The pump arrived without damage, mounted to bike quickly, and pumped tires to proper pressure quickly. Item is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: #1 Pump!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality pump! You can stop your search, this is your pump.
customer_reviews.author: George Fitting

customer_reviews.title: Good little pump.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, but does take a lot to pump a tire. The mount is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Harris

product_meta.title: DOKO-IN Mini Bike Pump with Gauge,Frame Mount Bicycle Tire Pump with Flexible Hose,Presta Schrader Compatible Hand Bike Pump,210 PSI Capacity,1 Year Warranty
product_meta.description:
Did You Ever Come to a Situation That While You are Cycling Suddenly…… Your Tire is Out of Air? It’s Always Happened in The Worst Time and its Always Very Annoying In Case You Don’t Carry with You a Good Pump!

For us it’s happened more than once, that is why you should have a good pump available next to you for immediate use in order not to ruin your family or friends ride and this is why you should choose us!

Our Pump is Made of 6063 Aluminum Alloy – Stuff That Railings and Strong Tubes are Made of!

Strong, sturdy and durable for easy use when you need it the most. Rest assure that with DOKO-IN mini pump you will get up to 210 PSI for fast inflation and getting back on track extremely fast!

Dual Action Pumping From Both in and out Motion:

You spend less time and effort to inflate your tire. By using the DOKO-IN mini bike pump you actually get high pressure PSI and dual action pumping at the same time!

No Damaged or Broken Valves!

Brilliant flexible hose design delivers easy pumping and no damaged or broken valves, make your experience smooth and comfortable!

Why the DOKO-IN Mini Bike Pump?

 * Presta & Schrader compatible with flexible multiple angle hose for comfortable use.
 * 210PSI capacity.
 * High quality performance pump.
 * Dual action pumping for high pressure and high volume of air pump in to your tire.
 * BONUS Sports needle - inflate balls.
 * Bike mount bracket kit.

Click the "Add to cart" yellow button at the TOP RIGHT and start cycling with confidence right away!

Our mini pump is durable and easy to use, we provide 1 year warranty! If for any reason you are not happy with our product, please let us know. We take full responsibility for the quality of our products!
feature_bullets: FAST INFLATING WITH OUR HIGH PRESSURE AND DUAL ACTION INFLATION PUMPING SYSTEM – You Don’t Need To Spend So Much Time To Inflate Your Tires Till You Give Up! With The DOKO-IN Bike Pump You Can Inflate Your Tire With High Pressure! With The 210 PSI / 15 Bar Capacity You Can Easily Inflate Any Bike Tire Or Basketball Football In A Short Time While Air Flow In Both In And Out Motion And Make Your Pumping Experience Much More Comfortable.

NO MORE BLOW TUBES WITH OUR UNIQUE PRESSURE RELEASE BUTTON – Never Come To A Situation That your Tube Will Blow Away From The High Pressure Just Press The Red Pressure Release Button To Reduce Excess Pressure Without The Need To Remove Pump From The Valve!

NO MORE BROKEN VALVES OR RIPPING OF YOUR TIRE – Our Super Flexible Valve Hose Allows A Simple Switch Between Presta & Schrader Without The Need Of Using Pliers, You Can Rest Assure That You Will Not Have Valves Stem Getting Bent Or Brake Or Even Find Your Self Pulling The Whole Valve Out Of Your Tire! Using Our Super Flexible Valve Hose Will Give You The Ability To Use Different Angles For Easy And Convenience Pumping Experience.
BIKE FRAME MOUNT – Attaches Securely To Your Bike and Hold Your DOKO-IN Pump Firmly in Space without Moving Around While Cycling.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE – High Quality CNC Cutting Aluminum Pump Supply Up to 210 PSI Pressure and Designed For Long Time Use, Strong Mechanism and Precise Parts, Fits for Mountain and Road Bikes, Customer Satisfaction Guarantee.
